participant_1.background:
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I'm a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
i commute by bus.

participant_2.background:
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
my favorite band is the avert brother.
I am a bit stressed from my work, but I'm generally a healthy person.
I check my security cameras to see if any intruders have tried to break in during the night.
I take a moment of silence to appreciate my family and the gift of time.

content.text: It's going well! I'm just got back from a long day at work and I'm taking a moment to relax.
Oh man, I know what you mean. I just got off work too and I'm exhausted!
What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse. What about you?
Oh cool! I've always been interested in engineering.
It's a lot of fun! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's so great! I love working on challenging problems and solving them.
What's the most challenging project you've ever worked on?
I'm working on a project right now to design a new type of bridge.
That sounds really cool! I'm sure it will be a success.
